question: يُؤَاخِذُكُمْ
answer: He will call you to account

question: وَالْمُنْخَنِقَةُ
answer: and that which is strangled (to death)

question: وَلَأُدْخِلَنَّكُمْ
answer: and I will surely admit you

question: وَلَأَدْخَلْنَاهُمْ
answer: and surely We (would have) admitted them

question: وَالْمُتَرَدِّيَةُ
answer: and that which has a fatal fall

question: صَدَقْتَنَا
answer: you have spoken the truth to us

question: مُكَلِّبِينَ
answer: ones who train animals to hunt

question: وَالنَّطِيحَةُ
answer: and that which is gored by horns

question: وَالْمَوْقُوذَةُ
answer: and that which is hit fatally
